page.title: 01Shopping Questionaire Result
page.content:
100 people shopping in Daventry from June 18 to 20 1985 were questioned.
1) How do you rate Daventry as a shopping centre? Very good 12% Good 24% Satisfactory 42% Poor 12% Very poor 10% COMMENT Those people satisfied with the shopping facilities outweighed those who were not by more than 3 to 1 (78% to 22%). Only 1 in 10 of those questioned thought that the facilities were very poor. We thought more people would be dissatisfied because many of our parents grumble about Daventry as a shopping centre.
